name: Total Zugzwang
description:
Come try an early version of the only arcade chess game around!

TOTAL ZUGZWANG

Battle for highscores against endless armies of chess pieces.

Strategize to defeat cunning Kings, while protecting your flank against brutish rogue pieces.

Build your battalion of Queens with risky promotions to survive into the end game.

The old chess tactics and openings can be thrown out the window, come and invent your own and you may have your name be part of a new chess legacy!

As we are still in development please share your most devious strategies (and any bugs you may find)!

Coming Soon:

  • Dynamic Music
  • Sound Effects
  • Tutorial
  • Online Leaderboards
  • Demos for sharing and analysing games
  • Puzzle Mode!

Minimax algorithm by Dickson Law.

Font by Daniel Linssen.
